string.name: bouncer_card_scan_instructions
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window, instructing the user how to scan card

resources.string: Наведите камеру на номер карты. Фото будет сделано автоматически

string.name: bouncer_card_scan_security
string.description: Security notification displayed below the scan window

resources.string: Информация о вашей карте находится в безопасности

string.name: bouncer_processing_card
string.description: Processing Text

resources.string: Информация о вашей карте находится в безопасности

string.name: bouncer_scanned_wrong_card
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window when the wrong card is scanned

string.name: bouncer_camera_permission_denied_message
string.description: Message shown to the user when camera permission is denied

resources.string: Пожалуйста, разрешите доступ к камере для сканирования вашей картыd

string.name: bouncer_camera_permission_denied_ok
string.description: Affirmative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog

string.name: bouncer_camera_permission_denied_cancel
string.description: Negative button shown as part of the permission denied dialog

string.name: bouncer_error_camera_title
string.description: Title of the dialog shown to the user when an error using the camera occurs

string.name: bouncer_error_camera_open
string.description: Message of the dialog shown to the user when an error starting the camera occurs

resources.string: The camera failed to turn on

string.name: bouncer_error_camera_access
string.description: Message of the dialog shown to the user when an error accessing the camera occurs

resources.string: В разрешении было отказано при включении камеры

string.name: bouncer_error_camera_unsupported
string.description: Message of the dialog shown to the user when the camera is not supported

resources.string: Это устройство не поддерживает необходимые функции камеры

string.name: bouncer_error_camera_acknowledge_button
string.description: Affirmative button shown as part of the camera error dialog

string.name: bouncer_api_key_invalid_title
string.description: Title of the dialog shown to the user when an invalid API key is specified

string.name: bouncer_api_key_invalid_message
string.description: Message of the dialog shown to the user when an invalid API key is specified

string.name: bouncer_api_key_invalid_ok
string.description: Affirmative button shown as part of the invalid API key dialog

string.name: bouncer_cardscan_logo
string.description: Accessibility description of the CardScan.io logo

string.name: bouncer_security_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the security notification lock icon

string.name: bouncer_preview_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the camera preview window

string.name: bouncer_debug_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the debug preview window

string.name: bouncer_close_button_description
string.description: Text used to close the scan window

string.name: bouncer_torch_button_description
string.description: Text used to turn on the camera torch

string.name: bouncer_swap_camera_button_description
string.description: Text used to swap the camera

string.name: bouncer_card_view_finder_description
string.description: Accessibility description of the view finder window
